strings.HAS_CONTENT: Add a resource URL instead of searching
strings.SPATIAL_REGION_ERROR: You have to click on an annotation before you can select a spatial region.
strings.OPEN_VIDEO_ERROR_1: Please select a video to continue!
strings.OPEN_VIDEO_ERROR_2: The specified URL is not responding!
strings.ANNOTATION_DATA_ERROR_1: You have to select a valid search result to continue!
strings.ANNOTATION_SAVE_ERROR_1: You have to add at least one annotation to save your data at the CMF!
strings.ANNOTATION_SAVE_ERROR_2: No anntations found! Data could not get saved to the CMF!
strings.ANNOTATION_SAVE_ERROR_3: Annotations do not exist! Please add at least one annotation to continue!
strings.ANNOTATION_SAVE_ERROR_5: Your login is not valid anymore! Please refresh your browser to continue!
strings.ANNOTATION_SAVE_SUCCESS: Your data has been stored in the cmf successfully!
strings.ANNOTATION_SAVE_NO_MODIFICATIONS: Nothing has been modified! No need to store data in the cmf!
strings.ANNOTATION_SPATIAL_REGION_HINT: You can also select a spatial region within the video to associate your annotation to that region.
strings.ADMIN_ERROR_ACCOUNT: You can not delete your active administration account!
strings.ADMIN_ERROR_GENERAL: Please check your inputs in the highlighted fields!
strings.ADMIN_ERROR_FILE_WRITABLE: Error: Your settings file is not writable! Please check its read-write-permissions!
strings.ADMIN_ERROR_FILE_OPEN: Error: Can not open your settings file
strings.ADMIN_ERROR_FILE_WRITE: Error: Can not write to your settings file!
strings.ADMIN_SUCESSFULLY_SAVED: Your changes have been saved successfully!
strings.ADMIN_ERROR_ACTIVE_LMDB: You have to select exactly one active LMDB source!
strings.ADMIN_ERROR_LMDB: You have to add at least one valid LMDB source!
strings.TOOLTIP_VIDEO_CONTAINER: This is your video player. It shows you the loaded video, but it can do much more than a normal video player! It allows selecting spatial regions within the video and that region can get assigned with an annotation. Try it, by creating an annotation and dragging a region in the video.
strings.ANNOTATOR_VIDEO_ADD_TITLE: Add a title for the selected video
strings.ANNOTATOR_VIDEO_ADD_DESCRIPTION: Insert a description text for you video

annotation_type.implicitlyShows: the selected element is shown implicitly
annotation_type.implicitlyMentions: the selected element is mentioned implicitly
annotation_type.explicitlyShows: the selected element is shown explicitly
annotation_type.explicitlyMentions: the selected element is mentioned explicitly

DESC.title: Select open to load a video from the CMF or any other HTML5 video

SAVETOCMF.title: Save your annotations to the CMF

SAVETOFILE1.title: Download your annotations as N3 file

SAVETOFILE2.title: Download your annotations as RDFXML file

SAVETOFILE3.title: Download your annotations as N3 turtle file
